title.rendered: Genuine Samsung Galaxy S5 S6 S6 Edge S7 S7 Edge Micro USB OTG to USB 2.0 Connector Adapter

content.rendered:
Genuine Samsung Galaxy OTG Micro USB Connector The USB OTG, it’s a networking commonplace that was launched to Android again in 2014, which helps you to plug in an exterior peripheral to your smartphone through a USB to micro USB cable. It additionally makes it doable for a number of gadgets to join immediately with one another. With Samsung Galaxy S7/S7 Edge related with a USB On-The-Go, typically abbreviated USB OTG, is a pacification permitting USB gadgets resembling digital audio gamers or cellphones to act as a bunch permitting a USB Flash Drive, mouse, or keyboard to be hooked up. The advantage of compatibility of Samsung Galaxy S7/S7 Edge with USB On-The-Go (OTG) permits two USB gadgets to discuss to one another with out requiring the companies of a private pc (PC).

Make positive this matches by getting into your mannequin quantity.
Original micro USB Host on the go OTG Cable – Micro USB B/Male to USB2.0 A/Female OTG Host Cable OTG perform
Connect to most USB Flash Drives, Mouse & Keyboards
With this OTG cable, you may join your system to most USB Flash Drive, Mouse & Keyboard
Official Samsung adapter ( GH96-09728A)
Ideal again up or alternative (NO RETAIL PACKAGING)
